sopt_sparsemat Struct Reference

#include <sopt_sparsemat.h>

Data Fields

int nrows

complex double * cvals
int * rowind
int * colptr

Detailed Description

Definition of a sparse matrix stored in compressed column storage format.

Note:
See Numerical Recipes for description of compressed column storage.

Definition at line 15 of file sopt_sparsemat.h.
